      • getEAIDNumber

        public static double getEAIDNumber(IAtomContainer atomContainer)
                            throws NoSuchAtomException,
                                   BadMatrixFormatException,
                                   IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Calculates the extended adjacency matrix index. An implementation of the algorithm published in (Chang-Yu Hu and Lu Xu. J. Chem. Inf. Comput. Sci.. 1996. 36).
        Throws:
        NoSuchAtomException
        BadMatrixFormatException
        IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Keywords:
        EAID number
